mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( username, email, pw, address, phone, provider, provider_id, profile_image, role, is_active, created_at ) VALUES( #{username}, #{email}, #{pw}, #{address}, #{phone}, COALESCE(#{provider}, 'LOCAL'), #{providerId}, #{profileImage}, COALESCE(#{role}, 'ROLE_USER'), COALESCE(#{isActive}, true), NOW() )
